channel.title: How do i turn on my ip from no-ip.com
channel.description:
I made my ip host thing at no-ip.com and i try i add it to the log in thing and it says error connecting to server
Can you help me solve this?
Thanks
Wwe Justin

item.description:

Im having the same problem. Im trying to bring my server ONLINE I port forwarded on my router’s page and made game port 1 and 2 and did the UDP TCP thingy right and downloaded no-ip duc and regesterd my server with no-ip and check the box so its smiling still can get it…
